name: Dinosaur Hunter
description: Embark on a great adventure to hunt down some prehistoric beasts!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Celeron™ J3355 Processor or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
